content.question: Although nuclear energy is considered a cleaner energy source than fossil fuels, some scientists argue this does not support the claim that nuclear energy is renewable. Which of the following claims best supports the argument that nuclear energy is a nonrenewable energy source?

choices.label: Nuclear energy has low carbon emissions and does not contribute to global warming.
The uranium deposits on Earth are finite.
Nuclear energy is generated by the process of nuclear fission.
Nuclear power plants convert water to steam, similar to fossil fuelâ€“burning power plants.

content.answer: The uranium deposits on Earth are finite.
